alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:13PM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Western Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1013 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brooklyn, or near Evansville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Multiple inch to inch and a half hail reports have been received from Green and Rock Counties. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Watertown, Stoughton, Oregon, Jefferson, McFarland, Monona, Lake Mills, Edgerton, Marshall, Waterloo, Cottage Grove, Johnson Creek, Deerfield, Cambridge, Brooklyn, Lake Ripley, and Lake Koshkonong. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
